title: Exciting New Activity
summary: One member of our team, Davide Pirovano, has been selected to to partecipate to the Dragon Boat festival in China as a member of a rowing team. We wish him luck on his adventure

title: Talk at PoLS 2024
summary: Happy to announce that our PhD student Letizia Pizzini has been selected to present her work on 'Topic Modeling to analyze spatial transcriptomic data from Allen Human Brain Atlas' at the Annual Meeting of the Physics of Living Systems in Trieste, taking place from June 3rd to 7th

title: Paper published
summary: Great to see our work on the cover of Nature Machine Intelligence. Many thanks to Marco Gherardi for kick-starting this project and bringing us on board!
